A few special words for my pearl:

* ♡ ⧽ I want to quote you two phrases that I really liked. one is by William Shakespeare and says "The friends you have and whose friendship you have already put to the test, hook them to your soul with steel hooks." the other is by Francisco de Quevedo and says "The friend has to be like blood, who then goes to the wound without waiting to be called." I love you, you are my person. - ブレンダ. userschonheitt—  ♡ ⧽ ’ & — ♡ ⧽ ’’ —  ♡ ⧽ … ❤
